description:
As a prison guard, Ye ShiJiu Lang is selected to enter the 'Absolute Wing Hall'── a prison dedicated to prisoners with serious crimes.

Here, there is only conquering and being conquered, and the rules are set by the strong!

Ye ShiJiu Lang is forced to be with Gu Yan, and is also forced to cater to the 'King's” unethical desires.

Helplessness, resentment, pain, and humiliation are the price that must be paid to survive here.

From the moment he entered this hell, he has been sentenced to life imprisonment.

Knowing the inside story, he will never be able to resist or escape…

When used to pain and fear,

Should he continue to fight and resist, or submit and obey?

It turns out that as early as nineteen nights ago, he has lost the right to choose.>
